import React from 'react' import Slider from 'react-slick'; import {ppost} from "../../../../dummyData" import Heading from "../../../common/heading/Heading" import "./popular.css" import "./Ppost.css"; const Ppost = () => { const setting ={ dots:true, infinite:true, speed: 500, slidesToShow:2, slidesToScroll:1, } return ( <>
{ppost.map((val) => { return (
{val.catgeory}

{val.title.slice(0, 40)}...

) })}
) } export default Ppost
